title: Pereira seeking to ´improve lots of things´ against Fulham
description: Despite Wolves getting a big win over Bournemouth last time out, Vitor Pereira is still looking to make improvements against Fulham in the Premier League on Tuesday. Wolves remain in 17th, one place above the relegation zone, but their win over the Cherries on Saturday moved them five points clear of the drop.
